review: Dice's Deli & Catering is a hidden gem in Manayunk with a cozy, welcoming vibe. The owners are incredibly friendly, and the food is fresh and generously portioned. I tried the chicken salad sandwich, which was unlike anything I've had before—truly unique and delicious. While it can get busy on weekends, the complimentary sangria is a nice touch. A great spot for a quick, satisfying meal!
